review_text: I found the counseling sessions very useful. The advice was practical and tailored to my career goals.
improvement_suggestions: A mobile app would make the platform more accessible.

review_text: The career guidance I received was spot on. The information helped me make informed decisions about my career path.
improvement_suggestions: More personalized content would be great.

review_text: I appreciate the detailed approach and the way the counseling process helped me improve my career trajectory.
improvement_suggestions: A more interactive user interface would be helpful.

review_text: The counseling provided was professional and aligned with my career aspirations. I feel more confident now.
improvement_suggestions: Add more resources for self-paced learning.

review_text: The advice I received was clear and practical. It really helped me understand what steps to take next in my career.
improvement_suggestions: More case studies would be helpful.

review_text: I am impressed by how thorough the guidance was. The recommendations are spot on for my career growth.
improvement_suggestions: Maybe add a community feature for users to interact.

review_text: The platform offers a variety of useful tools to help navigate career challenges. I found the sessions very engaging.
improvement_suggestions: Would love to see more videos or webinars on career topics.

review_text: I gained valuable insights into how to improve my skill set and advance my career through this platform.
improvement_suggestions: Add more detailed tutorials on career building.

review_text: I am very satisfied with the support provided. The insights into my career choices were extremely valuable.
improvement_suggestions: Would be great if there were more articles or blogs on entrepreneurship.
